title: Devon Franklin Interview and More
itunes:title: Devon Franklin Interview and More
description:
Thursday 9/28- Today on the show we had Devon Franklin come by where he spoke about his new book The Hollywood Commandments, self discpline and more. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a man that escaped from jail just to go back in to sell things. Moreover, Angela helped some listeners during "Ask Yee" and one listener who was on the down low was having relationship problems with his boyfriend who is an NFL player on the down low as well.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
